frontmatter.title: Logging and File Exporter
frontmatter.description: The logging exporter and file exporter are included as a part of the AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry(ADOT). An exporter is a component in the OpenTelemetry Collectorconfigured to send data to different systems/back-ends. An exporter translates the OpenTelemetry protocol (OTLP) formatted data to a different predefined format to be interpreted by another system or back-end. Pipeline data includes logs, metrics, and traces. The logging exporter and file exporter are local exporters intended for debugging the Collector or OTLP formatted data without setting up a backend.
